box_title: How to prevent police from tracking my phone - Quora
box_description: That is the easiest way to prevent tracking of a specific phone number. A phone that is turned off is not communicating with cell towers. It is the cell tower information, and triangulation, that allows authorities to follow the movements of a person through the use of their cell phone. Turn off the phone, no signal.

description: Mar 05, 2020   If you hear a voice telling you either 1 or 2, then it means your phone has not been infected by tracking software. If, however, you hear 3 or 4, then this means some is trying to, or already has, broken into your device. Try to reset the program of your device, although theres no guarantee if the reset will remove the spyware.
